Review Text: I recently stayed at JW Marriott Hotel Surabaya and had an amazing experience! The hotel is simply great, with a fantastic location that makes travelling around the city very convenient. Service is nothing short of phenomenal and the staff are extremely polite and professional. A special mention goes to Mr. Rohmad at the front desk‚Äîhe was incredibly helpful during my check-in and ensured all my requirements were taken care of perfectly. I have given 4 stars to the rooms, only because the ageing is showing in some areas. The rooms and bathroom hardware feel a bit old, though everything is fully functional and well-maintained. Overall, this is an amazing hotel to stay at and I highly recommend it for anyone visiting Surabaya. I will definitely return!

My recent stay at JW Marriott Surabaya as rewards for our 37 years of wedding anniversary was a masterclass in hospitality. The exceptional service began the moment we arrived, with the doormen offering a genuine and warm welcome. The reception team continued this stellar service, and we were particularly delighted by the lady manager who took the time to greet us and have a wonderful chat, making us feel truly valued. The dining experience during breakfast was another highlight, perfectly reflecting the JW Marriott's reputation for excellence. We were treated to an incredible breakfast, where the talented Chef Mami surprised us with a special dish of the day that was simply unforgettable. The passion of the restaurant team was evident in every interaction.While the service and dining were flawless, there were a few elements of the room that didn't meet the expected 5-star standard. The JW Marriott name should be upheld in every aspect, and we felt that some of the in-room amenities, while clean, were well past their prime. We understand the hotel has a long and proud history as a nearly 30-year-old establishment, but minor things like the mattresses, pillows, and towels shouldn't age with the building. The mattress felt worn out and the pillows lacked support, while the towels, though fresh, no longer had that soft, plush feel. Feeling of Premium Guest Room fade away... Overall, this was an outstanding stay defined by the incredible people who work there. A small refresh of the room amenities is all that's needed to make this hotel a truly flawless and iconic destination. We can't wait to visit again.

Sorry if this review comes a little late, but I believe it is better late than never, especially when it serves as important feedback for evaluation. I stayed as a guest on June 16‚Äì17, 2025. I would like to express that JW Marriott has always been the preferred and favorite choice for me and my family. However, our most recent experience was both disappointing and extremely concerning. My child nearly drowned in the swimming pool due to the absence of a lifeguard on duty. At that critical moment, my wife attempted to help but was unable to do so because of the pool‚Äôs depth, while I was briefly in our room retrieving clothes. The situation was nearly fatal. It is truly regrettable that a hotel of JW Marriott‚Äôs caliber, carrying such an esteemed international reputation, does not provide continuous safety supervision at its swimming pool facilities. This is not a minor oversight, but rather a serious safety hazard that endangers guests‚Äô lives. We consider this a fundamental breach of the standards of service and safety that should be a top priority for a hotel of this standing. Safety is non-negotiable, especially at a world-class hotel like JW Marriott. We sincerely hope that management will recognize the seriousness of this issue and take immediate corrective measures, as a single act of negligence could cost a guest‚Äôs life

I recently stayed at JW Marriott Hotel Surabaya in August for a relaxing family trip and overall, the experience was delightful. The hotel's ambience is classy and luxurious, and the smooth airport pickup set the tone for our stay. We stayed in a Junior Suite with Executive Lounge access, and the room was clean, comfortable, and lush, as expected. Room service was prompt, and the service at the hotel restaurants and Executive Lounge was stellar. The gym was well-equipped, and I particularly enjoyed the sauna. My traditional massage with Therapist Sara was phenomenal‚Äîher magic fingers truly worked wonders! The food generally exceeded expectations, although the roast at dinner was a bit dry. I also had a fun time at the pool with my nephew and niece, who loved playing with the available pool toys. However, there were a few areas where the hotel could improve. The pre-arrival service felt lacking; as a 5-star hotel, I expected a more intuitive, service-oriented approach, but I had to seek clarifications and follow up several times before confirming our itinerary. The welcome service, while thoughtful with the kueh lapis, elephant towel origami, and personal note, fell short of the stellar experience I've had at other JW Marriott properties, where guests are often welcomed with personalized touches like special amenities or an in-depth welcome briefing. Overall, our stay was relaxing and enjoyable, but I look forward to seeing the hotel elevate its pre-arrival and welcome experiences to truly match its prestigious reputation.

Hotel ini menggabungkan kenyamanan modern dengan keramahan yang hangat, memastikan setiap tamu memiliki pengalaman menginap yang tak terlupakan. Salam, Sakura Jaya Bearing Jl. We stayed at the JW Marriott Surabaya to celebrate my birthday anniversary. I made the reservation through the Marriott Bonvoy application and chose the Family by JW package. This package was perfect for us since we got breakfast for my wife, daughter, and me. We also got a tent in our room, a gelato, a cupcake decorating class, and some gifts for my daughter. During the check-in process, the front office staff were helpful. Ms. Lydia helped me in the check-in process. Almost all of our pre-arrival requests were accommodated. Our check-out process was seamless also. Ms. Afdilla assisted us during the process. We visited the SBCo bakery and cake shop to buy pastries, slice cakes, and gelato. The staff in the shop were friendly. Ms. Fera was very nice, she gave us a gelato and a box of macaroons as a complimentary for my birthday. Ms. Fia helped us when we bought some slice cakes. She explained the pastries and the cakes at the shop very well. She was helpful. The other staff, Ms. Feny and Nata, were also nice and helpful, they helped my daughter when she took the cupcake decorating class. The chef who assisted my daughter when she took the cupcake decorating class was patient. She could communicate well in English (considering my daughter can only understand English). I was not sure her name, but she was an intern. The shop offers delicious pastries and cakes and has great hospitality. Those are some of the reasons why we kept visiting the SBCo. We had breakfast at the Pavillion restaurant during our stay at the hotel. Ms. Indah always greeted us at the restaurant‚Äôs front desk. She was nice and helpful. She explained about the restaurant‚Äôs lunch and dinner packages, and allowed us to look around the restaurant to check the food menus they served during lunchtime. We received complimentary dishes, Rawon and Beef Oxtail soup, from Chef Sigit. The rawon was perfect. The meat was tender and the broth was delicious. The Beef Oxtail soup was great and delicious also. They used real oxtails which is very important. And the meat was tender and fall-off the bone. The carrots were perfectly cooked, it was cooked but still crunchy. The broth was light. Chef Endra also came to our table asking about the dishes, we had discussion about some restaurants and food with him. Mr. Asat was nice and friendly. He arranged for me to get a complimentary strawberry opera cake for my birthday with a candle on a plate with a ‚ÄúHappy Birthday‚Äù decoration. The other staff, Mr. Guntur and Ms. Munzia were attentive throughout our breakfast time in the restaurant. They were quick to take empty dishes from our table and offered water refill every time our glass were almost empty. The food at this restaurant was delicious overall. Special compliments to the staff, chef Sigit, and chef Endra. I also visited the health club several times. The staff (Mr. Suhadi, Mr. Anang, and Mr. Kevin) were friendly and helpful. They explained their facilities, and how to use the jacuzzi and the steam room to me. They also helped me to turn on the jacuzzi and the steam room. At the bar near the pool, I met Mr. Prima. He explained the hotel facilities and gave tips on which food we should try in the Pavillion restaurant. On Sunday, we had a chance to visit the Uppercut restaurant to get information and see their Sunday brunch set-up and menu. The staff lady who explained the menu and the information about the Sunday brunch was very friendly. Unfortunately, I didn‚Äôt see her name. This restaurant could be our next place to visit. One thing I might suggest is to renew the name tags of the hotel staff. Some of the staff‚Äôs name tags had their names almost erased. Overall, our stay in the JW Marriott Surabaya was enjoyable. The staff had great hospitality and impeccable service. We will visit this hotel again another day.

Excellent service. Staycation di masa pandemi ini sangat menyenangkan, apalagi dengan pelayanan hotel bintang 5 yang benar-benar luar biasa. Reservasi by phone hari Sabtu 6 Januari 2021 siang jam 12.00, kebetulan ada promo 1 night stay 850rb nett (include breakfast). Langsung kami setujui reservasi hari itu juga dan pukul 14.00 kami datang ke hotel. Akses terbatas, mobil disambut petugas security dan anjing pelacak untuk melakukan prosedur keamanan. Tiba di lobby suami saya parkir (area parkiran terbuka, cukup luas, tetapi agak jauh dari lobby), saya masuk dengan prosedur keamanan ala hotel bintang 5 pada umumnya, check in dan langsung bayar 850rb via debit card (pembayaran lunas tidak dikenai biaya jaminan 150rb), harga yang dikenakan sesuai yang diinfokan by phone, 850rb nett (dah include tax). Koper dibawakan bell boy hingga kamar sambil nunggu suami dr parkiran. Kamarnya terletak di lantai 17 (deluxe king city view, nonsmoking) . Benar2 nyaman dan bersih. Seperti biasa kami cek kebersihan tempat tidur, di atas tempat tidur diberikan hygiene kit (masker 2, tisu basah 2, handsanitizer spry mini). Semua komplit fasilitas kamarnya (check) walaupun diskonan :p. Selesai menata dan ganti baju renang kami langsung menuju ke lt 4 (gym dan pool, jaccuzzie tutup selama pandemi). Kolam renang gak terlalu luas tp lumayanlah, di tengah kota surabaya gitu. Pengunjung lumayan lah, kami renang sambil tetep jaga jarak dan 3M (secara covid ga nular di air kolam tp dr barang2 sekitaran kolam). Kalau pas ga nyebur kami maskeran, jadi kit yang isi masker tadi langsung kami bawa). Handuk dah disediakan di sana, petugasnya sebentar2 nanyain butuh handuk apa enggak. Kolam renang seger, cuma emang beberapa spot kaya dinding batunya agak berlumut. Kursi santai dan payung pantainya banyak, ga sah kuatir buat naruh2 barang dll. Overall nyaman kolam renangnya. Jam 19.00 kita rencana mau keluar ke TP cari makan, tetiba ada pelayanan yang nganter welcome snack gorengan (6 biji) dan petis. Trus kita ke TP, sayang banget jam 8 udah tutup (ada PPKM), pas nyampe di lobby lagi kita dikasih info sama petugas resto pavillion kalo ada promo dinner di resto pavillion pay one for two (420rb nett) WAHHH, sayang banget kita dah makan di TP (T.T), dah kenyang. Tahu gitu kan makan disana dah oke banget ga keburu2 jam 8 tutup. Ya sudah, belom rejeki. Akhirnya kita balik kamar dan menikmati istirahat dan suasana city view. Paginya kita breakfast di pavillion. Menunya komplit (western ,chinese, japanese, dan indonesia), sayang kalo rasanya masih kurang nendang, masih perlu diimprove lagi. Tapi dari segi variasi udah oke. Yang aku suka ada beras kencurnya enak banget, sampe abis 2 gelas (haha) jadi ada kaya mbak2 jualan jamu, pake keranjang juga gitulah. Asik. Kita ngabisin waktu di sana sampe jam 9.30, resto buka jam 6. Rencana mau renang lagi tp dah panas, jadi kita balik kamar langsung. Check out jam 12.00 seperti pada umumnya. Secara keseluruhan aku dan suami puas banget dengan pelayanan, fasilitas dan kebersihan di hotel ini. Pros: Bersih, pelayanan ramah banget, tiap ketemu pegawainya 3S (ga ada yang merengut), pegawai hampir semua good looking, fasilitas komplit walaupun harga promo. Overall very nice. Rooms are spacious and very affordable. We stayed at the 1 bedroom suite, with great views over the city. Given covid and reduced capacity the executive lounge was closed and instead at the lobby lounge. It gets a bit busy there in the evenings, and unfortunately quite smokey. The pool area is relaxing, green and nice. It would have been perfect if there was a bar, or at least a service to order drinks/snacks. Everyone is very friendly, and service overall was good. On one day the internet was very slow. Called to ask and was ensured the staff would check with the technician and call back. I also asked about spa services and the Platinum benefits, and after being on the phone waiting loop for 5 minutes I hung up. Never received a call back. No big deal, but I'd expect attention to detail at a 5 star property, and at least basic service such as calling back when you say you call back. Room is very comfortable and clean. Overall the hotel feels a bit old. I was very surprised the the valet parking was charged at a fee for hotel guests. Perhaps consider making that complementary, at the very least for Gold/Platinum members?

First and foremost I would like to thank Karen for making the best effort as well as the lounge team for their hospitality but please allow me to share some of my feedback. While the staff have been accommodating and trying their level best but the processes and property is really in need of major overhaul - considering it bears the brand of a JW Marriott, supposedly a level above an ordinary Marriott. I had provided feedback that my original room 2408 air-con wasn't really cold despite setting it to the coldest setting. Room was tired and worn out with cracking door frames, lack of charging and power sockets. The room I was being changed to was 2411 which had slightly better temperature setting in the room but was even worse as the curtain bears holes that let the sun in early in the morning and had dirty water pipes that poured out sand and murky water into the bath tub. During check in I was asked if I would be settling my bill and I said sure! But little did I know this meant I was not allowed to make purchases at any of the outlets. Despite being a member with a valid credit card used for reservation on my profile and also a fully settled room charges. Uppercut was disappointing as I was served a 2 day old Sauvignon Blanc that was flat and food was also mediocre - prawn that wasn't really fresh (black and slimy) as well as mussels that were not even opened. But staff was apologetic and friendly, the chef should bear responsibility of the standards being served as it's not the front of house's duty to apologise for poorly cooked food. While the lounge staff was really friendly and hardworking, but to be served Bloody Mary only on the first day but be told that it was not available was quite disappointing for an executive lounge. All in all, staff are genuinely the redeeming factor of the hotel. But the Management and the leadership team really need to wake up and start to work in making the hotel a JW and not just your everyday Marriott which is already a compliment. Because it's actually way below the standard of even a Marriott brand hotel. All in all, an absolutely disappointment of a JW Marriott and to be honest I should have stayed at the Sheraton instead.

Awal tahun yang seharusnya penuh sukacita berubah menjadi mimpi buruk pada tanggal 1 Januari 2026 karena layanan hotel yang mengecewakan. Sarapan disajikan di executive lounge, tetapi layanan yang diberikan sangat mengecewakan. Hanya tamu-tamu tertentu yang mendapat perhatian khusus, sementara meja saya sama sekali diabaikan‚Äîtidak ada layanan sama sekali, bahkan tawaran minuman pun tidak ada. Para staf berulang kali bolak-balik ke meja-meja di sebelah kanan, kiri, dan belakang saya untuk menawarkan minuman dan makanan, namun mereka tidak pernah datang ke meja saya. Piring-piring kotor di meja saya dibiarkan begitu saja, sementara meja di sebelahnya ditawari untuk membersihkan piring‚Äîpadahal jarak antara meja saya dan meja sebelahnya hanya sekitar satu meter. Mereka hanya melayani tamu yang tampak kaya, jelas-jelas menilai orang berdasarkan penampilan mereka. Menghabiskan Tahun Baru di JW Marriott adalah mimpi buruk. Pengalaman ini membuka mata saya terhadap fakta bahwa hanya tamu yang tampak kaya yang menerima layanan yang layak. Selain itu, saluran pembuangan kamar mandi tersumbat, perlu menunggu sekitar 3 jam agar air di lantai benar-benar kering.

Mohon maaf jika ulasan ini agak terlambat, tetapi saya yakin lebih baik terlambat daripada tidak sama sekali, terutama karena ini berfungsi sebagai umpan balik penting untuk evaluasi. Saya menginap sebagai tamu pada tanggal 16-17 Juni 2025. Saya ingin menyampaikan bahwa JW Marriott selalu menjadi pilihan favorit dan favorit bagi saya dan keluarga. Namun, pengalaman terakhir kami mengecewakan sekaligus sangat memprihatinkan. Anak saya hampir tenggelam di kolam renang karena tidak adanya penjaga pantai yang bertugas. Pada saat kritis itu, istri saya mencoba membantu tetapi tidak dapat melakukannya karena kedalaman kolam, sementara saya sedang berada di kamar untuk mengambil pakaian. Situasinya hampir fatal. Sungguh disayangkan bahwa hotel sekelas JW Marriott, dengan reputasi internasional yang begitu terpandang, tidak menyediakan pengawasan keamanan berkelanjutan di fasilitas kolam renangnya. Ini bukan kelalaian kecil, melainkan bahaya keselamatan serius yang membahayakan nyawa tamu. Kami menganggap ini sebagai pelanggaran mendasar terhadap standar layanan dan keselamatan yang seharusnya menjadi prioritas utama bagi hotel sekelas ini. Keselamatan adalah hal yang tak terelakkan, terutama di hotel kelas dunia seperti JW Marriott. Kami sangat berharap manajemen menyadari keseriusan masalah ini dan segera mengambil tindakan korektif, karena satu tindakan kelalaian saja dapat merenggut nyawa tamu.

Petugas pemeriksaan keamanan di hotel ini jelas-jelas diskriminatif. Pada tanggal 7 Agustus, saya pulang dari makan malam dan menyaksikan sekelompok orang yang datang dengan kendaraan mewah berjalan melewati pemindai sinar-X tanpa satu pun barang bawaan diperiksa. Namun, ketika saya mendekati area pemeriksaan yang sama, seorang petugas langsung meminta tas saya diperiksa. Ketika saya mengkonfrontasinya tentang kelompok yang baru saja diizinkan masuk, jawabannya adalah, Mereka hanya keluar sebentar. Saya pun, hanya keluar sebentar. Ini jelas merupakan kasus perlakuan selektif dan tidak adil, dan tidak ada alasan untuk kemunafikan semacam itu.

Pengalaman menginap yang sangat mengecewakan. Gangguan suara yang tidak dapat diterima jika kamar menghadap jalan. Kami terbangun pukul 4 pagi karena suara doa yang keras dari luar dan tidak bisa tidur lagi karena terus berlanjut hingga kami check out pukul 8 pagi. Pengalaman ini jauh dari tingkat kedamaian dan kenyamanan yang kami harapkan dari hotel bergengsi seperti JW Marriott. Staf hotel tidak menanggapi masalah tersebut meskipun kami melaporkannya saat check out atau melalui email. Yang kami dapatkan hanyalah pesan otomatis yang tidak berguna.

Gerbang masuknya membingungkan, tanda atau petunjuk masuk hotel sulit terlihat. Saya harus putar balik lagi untuk masuk ke hotel. Tempat parkirnya kecil dan terbatas, dan tiket parkirnya seperti toko grosir murah. Pelayanan di lobi resepsionis membuat saya menunggu sangat lama (lebih dari 30 menit tanpa ada kemajuan). Kamarnya kurang bersih karena suami saya mulai bersin-bersin karena debu, dan kamarnya tidak kedap suara, suara dari jalan dan masjid di sekitar dapat terdengar dengan jelas dan keras. Ketika saya mengeluh tentang hal itu, pihak hotel tidak segera memperbaikinya dan tidak memberikan pujian apa pun. Saya tidak merekomendasikan hotel ini untuk siapa pun yang menginap di sini untuk waktu yang lama seperti kami.

JW Marriott hanya sebatas nama. Hotel ini memang bagus dan mewah, tapi untuk kebersihannya saya sangat kecewa. Kenapa begitu, suatu kali saya makan di sana bersama teman-teman. Banyak lalat di area prasmanan, padahal hotel ini terkenal dengan pelayanannya yang baik, tapi jadi buruk karena pelayannya kurang memperhatikan kebersihan. Kenapa hotel bintang 5 ini tidak memperhatikan detail pelayanan dan kebersihan, termasuk makanannya? Saya sangat kecewa dengan kejadian ini, semoga ke depannya pihak hotel bisa meningkatkan kualitas pelayanan dan kebersihannya.

1. Kondisi kamar sangat buruk. Pertama-tama, sangat kotor. Kamar baik-baik saja sampai saya check-in, karena mereka menawarkan upgrade. Itu sampai saya check-in ke tempat tinggal yang berdebu dan tampak terlantar. Saya hanya berencana menginap selama dua malam, tetapi akhirnya saya meninggalkan rombongan saya dan pulang setiap malam. Saya alergi debu. Sampai hari ini, tubuh saya masih gatal. Saya sangat malu dengan nama Marriott. 2. Staf di sini hanya menyembunyikan kesalahan mereka, dan hanya setelah saya menemukan bukti dan mengajukan keluhan barulah mereka dengan enggan mengakuinya. Saya memesan menginap dua malam dengan tarif khusus Club Marriott + voucher Club Marriott (diskon 25%). Namun, karena kesalahan karyawan hotel, dua voucher digunakan, dan saya masih belum menerimanya. Ketika saya pertama kali menanyakan situasi tersebut, mereka bersikeras bahwa saya hanya menggunakan satu voucher. Kolam renangnya cukup bagus tetapi bak mandi yang kami gunakan airnya sudah teroksidasi sehingga kami tidak dapat menggunakannya sama sekali. Namun pelayanannya luar biasa dan restoran-restorannya secara umum bagus.

Setelah 3 hari di sini, saya benar-benar kecewa dengan makanan sarapan di sini, yang tidak cocok untuk wisatawan yang cukup beruntung untuk makan buah.,, dan staf layanan tidak antusias dan memiliki wajah yang tidak menyenangkan. tampaknya tidak menyambut pelanggan.. dan terutama di malam hari di lounge klub wajah pelayan terlihat seperti seorang pembunuh, bukan karyawan hotel dan makanannya sangat tidak enak dan roti yang saya makan terlihat seperti sejak beberapa hari terlalu keras dan ayamnya berbau seperti sudah ada di sana untuk waktu yang lama., ini jelas merupakan pengalaman di hotel ini. tidak ingin kembali lagi

Maaf sekali menulis ulasan ini. Hotelnya sangat tua. Saya sangat terkejut ketika masuk ke kamar mandi, ada beberapa kotoran di bak mandi. Kamar mandinya sangat tua dan belum direnovasi. Menginap yang Tidak Menyenangkan di JW Marriott Surabaya Saya menginap di Hotel JW Marriott Surabaya untuk staycation. Seingat saya, saya sudah menginap di hotel ini lebih dari 5 kali. Saya tiba sekitar pukul 23.00 malam, proses check-in cepat dan efisien (mungkin karena sudah larut malam). Setelah itu, saya berulang kali menerima fakta-fakta yang tidak menyenangkan tentang pengalaman menginap saya di JW Marriott Surabaya. Berikut akan saya jelaskan poin-poin tentang pengalaman tidak menyenangkan di JW Marriott Surabaya: 1. Saya memesan kamar Deluxe Premium King. Ketika saya memasuki kamar, saya tidak yakin apakah ukuran tempat tidurnya sama dengan yang diiklankan. Meskipun ukurannya besar, tempat tidurnya ternyata sangat nyaman! Poin nomor satu ini sebenarnya tidak terlalu mengganggu saya. 2. Keesokan paginya, saya turun ke bawah untuk sarapan dan langsung menuju Restoran Pavillion di lantai dasar untuk sarapan. Betapa terkejutnya saya ketika mengetahui bahwa area sarapan dipindahkan ke ballroom di lantai 2!!! Sungguh bencana yang mengerikan! Tempat ballroom-nya sangat tidak nyaman, seperti makan di food court, bukan di restoran. 3. Pelayanan sarapan sangat kacau dan buruk karena okupansi hotel tinggi selama masa liburan, dan pilihan makanan juga tidak sesuai dengan standar hotel bintang 5. Sebagian besar makanan yang disediakan adalah makanan Indonesia karena sepertinya hotel ini mengikuti tema perayaan Idul Fitri, tetapi hotel bintang 5 seperti JW Marriott seharusnya lebih dominan menyediakan menu makanan internasional! Telur tidak dimasak langsung di egg station melainkan dimasak di dapur (jadi telurnya tidak segar dan tidak bisa langsung diminta sesuai keinginan kita) sementara juga hanya ada 3 jenis buah di sarapan. Ini bukan sarapan prasmanan standar di hotel bintang 5! 4. Seperti yang sudah saya sebutkan, saya tiba di hotel hampir pukul 23.00 setelah perjalanan panjang, jadi setelah sarapan, saya berpikir untuk meminta late check out hingga pukul 13.00 agar bisa beristirahat lebih lama karena saya sangat lelah. Ketika saya di resepsionis dan menyampaikan permintaan saya kepada resepsionis wanita yang sedang bertugas di sana, resepsionis tersebut dengan sangat tidak sopan menunjukkan ekspresi tidak senang! Ini SANGAT TIDAK DAPAT DITERIMA! Jika ternyata okupansi Anda memang tinggi dan kemungkinan Anda tidak dapat mengakomodasi late check-out, pertanyaan saya adalah: Tidak bisakah Anda mengomunikasikan hal itu kepada saya dengan ramah? Jika Anda menjelaskan situasi Anda dengan ramah, tentu saja saya akan mengerti dan membatalkan permintaan saya, lalu akan check-out pukul 12 siang! Saya tidak bisa berkata-kata. Hotel ini sangat mengecewakan. Bagi Anda yang mencari hotel bintang 5 di Surabaya untuk menginap, saya sangat merekomendasikan Anda untuk menginap di Shangri-La Hotel Surabaya (dengan harga yang kurang lebih sama) yang memiliki pelayanan yang sangat memuaskan di semua aspek, atau mungkin di The Westin jika Anda bersedia mengeluarkan uang lebih. Saya menyatakan dukungan saya untuk JW Marriott Surabaya agar dapat ditingkatkan! Pihak hotel dapat menginvestigasi staf resepsionis yang tidak ramah dan mengembalikan sarapan prasmanan ke Pavillion Restaurant. Jika hotel memang harus menaikkan tarif menginap untuk meningkatkan layanan, hal itu juga dapat diterima, karena tentu saja, orang-orang yang menginap di JW Marriott bersedia membayar lebih untuk layanan yang luar biasa dan pengalaman yang menyenangkan. Saya rasa saya masih ingin memberikan kesempatan kedua untuk hotel ini, tetapi yang pasti, saya akan menghindari menginap di sini selama periode puncak karena hotel ini tampaknya kewalahan menangani banyaknya tamu.

Menginap di sana untuk sebuah acara. Kami tiba di lobi sebelum waktu yang dijadwalkan dan langsung memberi tahu penyelenggara acara, tetapi harus menunggu sekitar 1 jam untuk bus ke lokasi. Karena penerbangan kami pagi-pagi keesokan harinya, kami meminta untuk meninggalkan lokasi lebih awal dan mereka menjadikan kami tamu terakhir yang meninggalkan tempat. Tidak direkomendasikan karena mereka tidak menghargai waktu Anda.
